title: Crime & Cake
description: USA Today Bestselling author, N.M. Silber whips up a delicious treat that is both sweet and full of spice. When Philly prosecutor, Matt Brenner spies a beautiful woman rowing a cake to flee a raid he's amused. When she turns out to be a charming flirt with a wicked wit he's aroused. When discovers she's opposing counsel he's intrigued. Find out what yummy treats await when a brand new couple of hot and hilarious lawyers tangle in both the courtroom and the bedroom in Crime & Cake!  NOTE: This is a SHORT STORY not a full-length novel or a novella.
author: N.M. Silber
